<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cycle Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=3467) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 26</row>

**Archetype** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173)

**Prerequisites**
[Soul Warden Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3466)

</column>

---

Your devotion to the cycle of souls grants you an additional divine spell. Choose from [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [_disrupting weapons_](/Spells.aspx?ID=80), or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148). You must make this selection when you take this feat and it can't be changed. Once per day, while your spiral is glowing, you can cast the selected spell as a divine innate spell.
